summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PWA Analytics application. Frontend loads successfully with excellent UI/UX, language switching, theme switching, and PWA features working correctly. Critical issue found: analytics data is not being captured or displayed despite tracking infrastructure being in place.

backend_issues.notes: Backend is minimal FastAPI server not used for analytics - app is client-side only as designed

critical_bugs.issue: No analytics data is being captured or displayed despite demo page interactions
critical_bugs.details: All KPIs show 0, real-time section empty, no pageviews/events recorded

ui_bugs.details: Browser security prevents clipboard access without user gesture
Recharts showing dimension warnings for empty charts

integration_issues.issue: Data flow from insight.js tracking script to main app IndexedDB not working
integration_issues.details: Service worker receives messages but data not appearing in dashboard

passed_tests: Navigation to all pages (Overview, Pages, Sources, Tech, Geo, Visitors, Sites, Settings)
Demo page loads and allows interactions
UI properly localized in Arabic with RTL layout
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix analytics data capture - tracking events from demo page are not being stored in IndexedDB or displayed in dashboard. Investigate service worker message handling, IndexedDB operations, and data synchronization between tracking script and main app. Also fix clipboard permission issue for copy snippet functionality.
